message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget.

I understand you're on a tight budget, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make at least $110 to make it worth my while. How about we meet in the middle at $115?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we try $100? I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to pay a bit more to get it.
